content.webTitle: Plant of the week: Verbascum 'White Domino' | Lia Leendertz

fields.headline: Plant of the week: Verbascum 'White Domino'
fields.bodyText: Verbascum 'White Domino' is tall, stately and elegant with pure white flower spikes from early to late summer. It looks as comfortable in the dappled shade of a woodland situation as it does in a sunny border. Buy three bare-root plants for £11.95, or six plants for £17.90; prices include UK mainland p&p. Call 0330 333 6851, quoting ref GUPW204, or go to our Readers' Offers page. Delivery from November.
